website_summaries.verdict: In the face of stiff competition, the Nikon Coolpix S6300 is an above average point-and-shoot made slightly better by a low price, simple operation, and nice features.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix S6300 is a small, lightweight pocket camera with a ultrawide-angle 10x zoom lens that's easy to pick up and use and has a nice assortment of snapshot shooting options
cons: Though its overall shooting performance is good for its class, the autofocus is temperamental

customer_reviews.title: Smaller viewing and scene framing area than previous models
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the microphone in the model. Films must be edited for motor noise on high pass filters to get dialog clear. Previous model did not do that. I bought this because it's one of the few that actually give you 1080P. Everything I looked at, even expensive Sony and Nikon, are 720 P only. That is bad. I put up with the extra work on the audio in order to get the 1080P. Screen and scene framing is smaller too. Quality is going downhill. I make 'films' not backyard videos.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing memory card
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera because it’s just like the one I used for years and it’s perfect for me. I went to use it first time on Saturday and after 6 pictures it said memory full. After an hour of trying to figure it out and a long call with Amazon help line, I finally figured out there was a battery but no memory card. The camera without it only let me take 6 pictures. I took the memory card from old camera and now it works. Very frustrating but ok now. I guess if worse comes to worse I can buy a new memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Dunie

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera a couple of years ago to replace an older coolpix that was still working but I wanted one with some newer features. I've used it on several trips and have been pleased with the photos. The battery lasts a long time for me. Just to be safe I purchased a second battery pack that I keep charged and in my camera case. If I need it in the middle of a day, it's there. I find that close up photos using the macro setting are better if I remember to keep 3-4 feet away from the object I'm photographing. Overall I think it's a great camera for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Scheuermann

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice to buy a camera and not feel the need to immediately return it. I bought the red one, since it was $50 cheaper just for the color (really? Who cares what color it is! Shut up, and let me keep my money!). It has incredible zoom, and the pictures are much clearer than those I have taken with any of my other cameras. It even has a lithium battery, so you don't have to worry about continuously buying batteries, though the camera needs to be charged for a full four hours before it's operable at all, which includes when you first receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey May

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive camera, even better with Eye-Fi
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife to replace the S230 my kids broke. Works awesome. Some pocket cameras take a long time to process and save a shot before the next shot is ready. This one's quick. Other cameras have a bad delay from the time you push the button until it takes the picture. This one is almost instantaneous. It's not as fast as a DSLR, but you don't lose your shots either. We've had several cameras in the past from the likes of Samsung, Vivitar and others, but we've liked all the cameras from Nikon. They're responsive, slim and do they're job. Add in an Eye-Fi card and life is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I got it used and it arrived in excellent condition with all attachments. The camera seems to have the usual functions some of which I've only begun to explore. It's compact and easy to use. My only gripe is that I've had it for only a month and it froze for no reason. On/Off button, zoom, menu buttons, nothing would work. I finally had to pull out the battery and it finally reset itself. Obviously someone returned this camera because of this. However, considering how little I paid for it, and unless it develops other problems, it might be worth bearing this one malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my Europe trip this past summer because the only camera I use is my iphone, which doesn't take great pics at night or indoors. This camera was very slow to take pictures. The battery died quickly after it was fully charged. The most annoying thing about this camera was that if the camera died while it was on and the lens was out, the lens didn't automatically retract and then it wouldn't fit back in my clutch... super annoying when you're out at a club/bar at night. I returned this as soon as I got back from my trip.
customer_reviews.author: EmDubSpin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a total waste of money. The battery life was very short then the camera completely dies. It would not accept a charge. I assumed it was a bad battery so I bought another battery which cost 1/3 as much as I paid for the camera!!! Within a short time that battery was dead and again it would not charge. Perhaps the charger is bad but I am so disgusted I am just going to throw it away and buy a different camera. My last Nikon was a good camera but after this experience, no more Nikons for me!
customer_reviews.author: Chopsticks101

customer_reviews.title: My First Camera
customer_reviews.text: And it's a honey! I LOVE IT! I was shocked at how small this camera was, but I haven't owned a camera in over 30 years and times have changed for grandpa here! LOL The photo's are very detailed, no blurring at all. Inside and outside, I haven't noticed any problem with the photo's. I do live in North Dakota and have discovered that when the temps are below ten degrees Fahrenheit there is a lag on the auto-focus; everything seem to slow down. That's OK, I have learned to adjust my picture taking - and I just keep the camera on the inside of my parka to keep it warm. Great price + great product = happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Gross

customer_reviews.title: Product failed, but not quite soon enough.
customer_reviews.text: After only 5 months, camera charging port no longer worked. I only used this camera a few times. It replaced a Nikon Coolpics that gave me years of service. Seller won't take back, been too long they said. I wasted 259.00. Lesson: be apprehensive of buying electronics here or anywhere online. My purchase didn't fail quite soon enough. The box wasn't sealed and was a little worn.
customer_reviews.author: Norman James Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX S6300 16 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This item exceeded my expectation. This point and click camera is easy to use and have great features. This item was received in an expedited manner. My camera was properly package. This camera came with a 16 megapixel memory.When I received this camera it was ready to use the only thing it did not come with was a charger, however the vendor I purchase this camera from had this advertised on the Amazon site, so I was aware the charger issue. I would not hesitate purchasing from this vendor againg.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great features for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my nephew & his wife as they recently had their fist child and were making pica with their phones. This camera has excellent photo quality for a point and shoot. They are pleased with the photos and the video. Pros: excellent photo quality; hd video; multiple scene and other options; nice size. Cons: not many - the flash location (like most small point & shoots now) takes some getting used to. In general I would definitely recommend this camera for anyone who wants an easy-to-use camera with nice photo and video quality.
customer_reviews.author: JennW.

customer_reviews.title: Issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine camera, and it takes good pictures. I am pleased with the battery life too. However, I've had it for about a year and it freezes sometimes while zooming in, and I have to remove the battery to get the lens to return and close. Also, it is having som focusing issues. You just have to switch it off and start over. I'm careful with my equipment, so I don't understand this one. One more thing, the black around the LCD is coming off revealing the gray underneath. Cosmetic but worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Deronda

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for close-up shots
customer_reviews.text: I finally figured out how to download the Nikon software. Camera came with strap, no battery. Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera.
customer_reviews.text: Good small camera for a small price. Easy to carry and the preview screen is good in most light conditions. The picture area in wide angle is great. It will capture a high church facade while you are standing close to it. The zoom is very good too. We used it for a week taking about 50 pictures, and it did not need to be recharged. I added a 64 GB SD card (not included with the camera). It could have been a much smaller SD card but I got confused as I ordered it and got the big one by mistake. I will probably never have to dump the pictures from it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Coviello

customer_reviews.title: Super Performance in over 10,000 photos!  No problems at all and a clumsy old man can take outstanding photos with no effort!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second purchase of this unit. The original is still fully functional but has taken many thousands of pictures (10,000 I think) and I'm planning a lot trip and didn't want to get stuck buying another camera on the fly. I wanted one that takes the same batteries, since I'd bought spares. I'm no wiz, but this model takes perfect photos and videos with no effort.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Takes nice pictures; slowness can be eased
customer_reviews.text: We've had this camera for a while now, and it has been very good to us. It takes nice pictures and has a pretty simple interface. It can burn through the stock battery pack quickly, but we bought some extra ones cheap, and switching out is not a problem. At first, the camera operated really slowly, but we were able to alleviate that issue by putting in a higher-quality memory card. So if you're having trouble, try addressing that aspect of your setup, since cruddy old cards will be written very slowly!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary R. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are not always sharp even with different settings.
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this camera again. I had the Kodak EasyShare which took clear, crisp pictures but I decided it was time to update my camera. I bought the Coolpix for price and the good reviews. With this camera I cannot depend on my pictures to be sharp. I have tried many settings but I still get blurry pictures a lot of the time. I know I don't have the steadiest hand but I don't noticeably shake. I have to take several pictures of my subject to make sure I get at least one acceptable picture.
customer_reviews.author: applepie4

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the perfect size to throw in a purse and take for dinner or a night out but it is very finicky on lighting. The pictures are often over exposed if the flash is needed and generally struggles in low light. If you can get the lighting right, the pictures are great. I love the video capacity, it has a fairly good sound quality and is a quick switch from picture mode to capture the moment!
customer_reviews.author: ANA

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for hubby
customer_reviews.text: Now every member of our family has a CoolPix camera. My husband bought mine for me a few years ago and I use it tons for my art. I'm a landscape painter who paints on location. It's great to get shots to reference later and also to show a photo of what I was viewing on my web site. My husband wanted to take mine on a golf trip and I wouldn't let him cause I need mine so I had to get him one too! This one has a better zoom and some nice added features like an option for an action/sports shot!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Its was furbished and still didn't work. But the seller refunded it so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something that was easy as the Coolpix I bought several years ago, but wanted some advanced features, most of all something that could correct my shaky hands and/or blurry pictures. Haven't had success in these things. Am just starting to read about all the settings, though I didn't expect such a complex camera. Esp since the font of the instructions are so small. Would probably not have bought this if I had known I had to make so many choices.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Woodhouse

customer_reviews.title: Good Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic camera - nothing fancy. It powers on quickly, and focuses pretty quick. If you turn on too many features (smile detect, etc) it will drastically slow down focusing. Only use those features for an organized group photo! It certainly doesn't replace the DSLR for quality or speed. My 6MP D50 makes a better pic, as it should, but this is very handy to carry around, and will easily fit in a shirt pocket.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX S6300
customer_reviews.text: I did not have good luck with this camera; the battery was constantly "exhausted" but even when it was working the pictures were not as crisp and clear as I would have liked. At one point, another traveler used my camera to photograph me and commented on how poorly the camera was working. After getting back home, I attempted to download my photos on to my computer, but the USB cable was not the one pictured in the manual. I ended up having to use the SD slot to accomplish this task. All in all, I won't be using this camera again; I am truly disappointed in all aspects of it.
customer_reviews.author: DSP

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT Blue
customer_reviews.text: The camera seems to be fine though I haven't had a chance to use it much but I thought I had been sent the wrong color. The camera is PURPLE not blue! Nikon doesn't make this camera in "purple" but they need to classify this blue one as purple! Not sure I would have ordered this color had I known it's true color; probably would have went w/ the red one. Maybe the misnamed color is why none of the many stores I checked w/ kept the "blue" one in stock!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: I love Nikon cameras and have owned many over the years
customer_reviews.text: I love Nikon cameras and have owned many over the years. This is the perfect point and shoot camera. Love the red color as no one accidentally picks up mine at a gathering. Sleek design. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SonnyB

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Camera for Conditions That Aren't Too Dusty.
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera overall - excellent photo quality and features. I replaced my old Nikon 4300 with this - it's a fraction of the size and weight. My only complaint is that I've had to send it in for service due to dust interfering with the lens extension / bellows assembly. Never had that happen with the 4300, but likely a common problem with all the new tiny cameras.
customer_reviews.author: William-NM

customer_reviews.title: OK, but Older model seems better
customer_reviews.text: Works good, like the zoom range. Has problems sometimes when zooming, can't focus as well as my older model camera. Picture quality is also less in some situations. Good price for what you get. Fits great in pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one of this model because my first one stopped working after 4 months, but the good news is that when I contacted Nikon, they fixed it for free! I had already purchased another one because I wanted it for my vacation plus I am used to company's not backing their product but was pleasantly surprised with Nikon's customer service. I highly recommend this camera if you are looking for something small that takes excellent pictures and manufactured by a reliable company.
customer_reviews.author: smo

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one in 8 years
customer_reviews.text: I had my other one...the S6000 for 8 years & was very pleased with it. I purchased it for mainly video cuz I have a Nikon DSLR. It is a great price for what it does :-) The quality of the photos can be a little grainy for me but for you it might be perfect :-) For what I put the last one through it was great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: yourpalval

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for around use. The image is stable when using the zoom mode.
customer_reviews.text: All the local stores were selling this camera in red. Amazon had a good price on it in a few other colors. I liked the bluish purple one. It does not have a button to turn the flash off. I use the museum scene mode (no flash), closeup, and auto mode most of the time. It does not have a default mode when you turn the camera on, it comes up with the last scene mode setting. One main feature for purchasing this camera was the zoom works in the video mode. The 1080 videos have to be converted to a smaller size for uploading. I purchase the HDMI cable to display video and pictures directly to my TV.
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip I was taking to India. I didn't want to drag my DSLR equipment all over with me but wanted something that would take good pictures for a reasonable price. This did not disappoint. I always miss my DSLR level controls when I don't have them but this is quick and simple.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a previous S6300 that was damaged. This is a great little camera. It is compact, lightweight and easy to use. The photos are sharp and clear. My only complaint is that I am an old-school photographer and I miss the eye-level viewfinder. This would allow me to hold the camera more steady, especially under low light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Best small size camera I have owned so far
customer_reviews.text: I have owned three small digital cameras. An Olympus Fe 4020, a Panasonic DMC-FH20, and a low end Kodack camera. The Nikon CoolPix S6300 out performs them all. It's easy to use, lightweight, It takes great pictures both indoors and out, and the software that comes with the camera has some great editing features. Overall if you are a novice like me, I think you will be pleased with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis E. Abdur-rashed

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpic S6300
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and love it already I just have to read up on all the wonderful features it has to offer, it's been 15 years since I had a new camera so I really needed to get updated and this camera certainly does that. Looking forward to using at Christmas when all the family is here, it is so compact I can keep it in my purse to use whenever I need it,
customer_reviews.author: Enilorac4

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad camera
customer_reviews.text: It came on time and well packed, however the camera leaves a lot to be desired. The zoom is 8X however it is very hard to focus if at all possible at that exposure, it has also a very slow shutter between pictures, I expected a much better product from Nikon at $150! I am even thinking of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Great low-lighting, optical zoom, but bad macro
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try Nikon because of the optical zoom over my Canon ELPH camera that accumulated dust in the sensor. I like the CMOS sensor and optical zoom on this camera, but the macro is terrible. I use this camera for work and I could never take closeups of anything low-light or anything reflective like stainless steel. I started taking my dirty sensor Canon back to work because the macro there was great. Next camera I'm going for a Canon CMOS sensor ELPH like the 320 or 330 HS.
customer_reviews.author: Jon MA

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera, I still would love one day to be able to afford one where I can switch out the lens for different uses. I'm still learning all the options about the camera which takes a little time to understand. If I could see a improvement a how to video would be nice as part of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton

customer_reviews.title: A really good camara
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camara here instead of target becuase target's sale price was 30.00 over the price here and they only had red and silver. My husband and I both love it. The only little problem is the battery is not long lasting but we just bought the car charger/addtional battery kit that amazon sells for 19.99 to help with that problem so were are very satisfied with this camara. I had a sony camara before buying the Nikon S6300 and the pictures are much better on the Nikon than on Sony. To me that says alot.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Nikon and so far I'm very much impressed with what you can do with such a small camera. Apparently size in today's cameras does not limit its capabilities. Beautiful pictures and the ability to take panaromic shots makes this camera even more special along with it's High Def video function. I would recommend this camera for the average user and I think those with more photo experience will be surprised how well it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: D. Meier

customer_reviews.title: To late
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to other reviews. Very Frustrated with this camera. I have not had good luck with these types of cameras. The lens locks up on me. Several times I have had to take the battery out , to get it to make any changes. Like turning off. Do not recommend this camera, so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amcmull

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good when the focus works but does not work all the time.
customer_reviews.author: an American

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice if somewhere on the box it would have said that you can only store 7 pictures on it with the sd card. I sent my daughter to camp for a week and she could only take 7 pictures. I have bought an SD card and so we are ready for our next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Debby with a Y

customer_reviews.title: Good Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally shoot point and shoot cameras. Bought this for my wife. But it works well. Good pictures and the video is good. I recently did a short promotional video in Peru with the 6300. I didn't have my DSLR with me so I was forced to use it. Did a very good video. When edited it look good. Good point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself looked in decent shape but when I put the battery in it and turned it on it said lens error and it shut off immediately it was blurry would not work and absolutely was not in very good condition like the seller claims I returned it immediately I am so not happy with this purchase I waited 5 days to get the camera and then I couldn't even use it and I needed it to go to a wedding today not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: You just can't get a small camera with the picture quality and zoom like this one for such a great price!! I was so impressed with the camera, which I got super fast, I'm thinking about getting one for my mom. It's small and perfect to put in your purse or pocket. I will say, the blue looks more purple, but I still love the color.
customer_reviews.author: katt7482

customer_reviews.title: Don't last a minute
customer_reviews.text: Nikon Coolpix s6300.. Actually I have purchased three in the last year. I did drop the first one but not the others. "Service" claimed that was the problem. I have a spare charger and batteries to guard against the short life. Nikon has been the highest quality camera for me - back to F1 - so these poor excuses of camera are a great disappointment. The telephoto has stopped working, and I usually just live with it when the results are poor. I really read the reviews today to see if someone had posted a recommendation for similar sort of camera but one that works for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: dersa

customer_reviews.title: Size Clarity Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, light and handy. I love it! Pics are so crystal clear and full of color. Very easy to use - no complicated functions for non-pro picture takers. The zoom function is amazing too compared to the size. price is OK, but it misses the blue tooth or wireless connection to pc or smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonner

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: This cameras is amazing with all of the many features it is still user friendly for the novice and the pictures are so vivid even the shots far away where you have to zoom in close and the camera sometimes Pixelate with this camera and its expansive zoom capabilities you don't have to worry about that. Great camera. My wife and I have not found any dislikes as of yet so if you are in the market for a god camera but don't want to spend a bundle this would be the camera to Look for!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. K. White

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: We added this camera to our collection because of the brand and ease of use. We have Full Body Nikon cameras but this one will fit in your pocket. We also purchased this camera as a gift so our Grandson could utilize his creativity energy in a positive fashion. Looking forward to good results!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Huey

customer_reviews.title: I like the zoom the most...
customer_reviews.text: ..for such small practical camera but I had the bad luck of getting one that gets the lens stuck. Luckily, I found out that removing-off and on the battery it retrieves the lens back. I tried to return it but I had just missed the date. I am going on a trip to Europe and I hesitate to take this camera with me. I just feel it’s not dependable. If some can recommend me another one I would appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: M.Z.T.

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to take this camera to Disney World!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few Nikon cameras before so I know they have good products. Yet again, they do not disappoint! There is a very short processing time, which I love and I have a feeling it would be really easy for my low tech dad to operate when I need him. My previous camera, which was a Samsung, was good but the processing took too long and zooming in was a pain. Not so with this camera! Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: but she found this easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mom. She is not technologically inclined. but she found this easy to use. She loved it. Takes good photos. better than most cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: dima

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for myself.
customer_reviews.text: I hardly take photos so I do not have enough experience with this camera to give an accurate opinion. However, I do think that there are too many options on the camera itself, and the function buttons are too small. Also, when I click the button to take a picture there seems to be a delay so unless the subject is a still life the photo has to be redone.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Salvanti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes good pictures and lasted about as long as I could expect...just replaced this camera but have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Carol LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera only four months ago and without any warning it stopped working. I was so excited when I bought it and for this to happen! I am so upset as I have tried everything possible and it won't power on. Think carefully before purchasing this camera...
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I like all of the options available with the camera (extended zoom, multiple light settings, etc.). However, I have noticed sometimes the picture is blurry, especially if you are using the zoom. For the most part the pictures are great quality. The camera is easy to use and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, 3 years and still loving it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera back in 2013 and it is still going strong. Great resolution, great battery life and it's convenient in size and weight. I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela F.

customer_reviews.title: too bulky and heavy
customer_reviews.text: rhis camera takes good pictures, but was too big and bulky. I was hoping it was smaller. I am returning it and getting a sony cybershot. i love to take pictures but hate carrying a camera around! i really wanted a cell phone size camera with a flash, and some digital zoom.
customer_reviews.author: joseph2221

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift. I am a Nikon user so it was easy to set up and explain the operation. very nice camera and great pictures for the price. Sure you could get better pictures from a more expensive camera, but for the price this one is easy to use and gives great results.
customer_reviews.author: tim smith

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, I semi wish there was an easy way to make the file sizes smaller. I'll just buy a bigger hard drive. I don't get to take pictures as much as I used to but this comes in handy until I buy an SLR. The HD is excellent. The zoom is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Rozo A.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a great camera. I took it to Canada, and I took over 300 pictures. I could be far away and it brought everything close up. I would recommend this camera to a friend or any person. The price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: April L. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Incredible bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased as a gift for or daughter. I had recently purchased one on sale from a retail chain for over twice the cost! Camera arrived quickly and was exactly as described. Has been working great. Love the size and large number of settings and features of this camera! No complaints or concerns with this Amazon purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AW28602

customer_reviews.title: Nikon CoolP 16 mp is a great affordable purse camera to have handy
customer_reviews.text: the Nikon Coolpix is a quick to have in hand camera that will work in a pinch. As far a pocket digital cameras go you can go wrong here, the compact size and quick speed to boot up make it readily available for that instant pic you need to take
customer_reviews.author: mikeSVTCobra

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I would have like it takes to long ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I would have like it takes to long for the picture to go off, outside of that it's very pretty and I still use it from time to time .
customer_reviews.author: SneezynWheezy

customer_reviews.title: A good camera at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat camera. A good point and shoot camera. It takes very good pictures. My Son had a camera like this which got dropped. He liked the camera very well and wanted another camera just like the one that got dropped. This is the second camera that my Son has owned like this. He has taken some very good pictures with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Twila Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Bargain beginners camera
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as strongly constructed when it was originally introduced. Betty than most in this price range for point and shoot photography. Sharp lens.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wasted.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with problems plugging USB cord into camera. The manufacturer said the problem was my fault and the bill for fixing it would be as much as a new camera. Wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Literary Shopper

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for all the bells and whistles then don't buy this. I bought it for my aging mother who just wanted to point and shoot. Works great for her and the pictures are of a nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle One

customer_reviews.title: I love my camera :)
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes some amazing pictures for being a point and shoot! It's light weight and easy to take anywhere. The digital zoom on it it actually great too. I always have problems with digital zoom but on this camera it is not bad at all :)
customer_reviews.author: Mo DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: I just opened it... but it looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these cameras but stupid me... I got water in the lense... Well anyway... I liked it so much, and my computer is set up for this connection so I knew that I wanted to get another one. It takes great pictures and movies. When I took it out of the box it looked new and perfect even though I ordered it used... I love it... Thanks... <3
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Gooseberry

customer_reviews.title: Slow.
customer_reviews.text: S L O W. Slow to turn on, slow to turn off, slow to switch functions, slow to flash, slow to focus (it hunts a lot). When the lens got scratched, I was almost relieved to have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: ... for many months now & it continues to take fine photos under varying conditions - indoors and out
customer_reviews.text: been enjoying this camera for many months now & it continues to take fine photos under varying conditions - indoors and out, scorching and frigid temps, wouldn't advise underwater use however!
customer_reviews.author: W. H. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: nikon coolpix camera
customer_reviews.text: love this camera. ,right size and fit for my purse. takes great pictures and is easy to change for inside to outside. arrived in a timely manner. love the fact that you plug it in to get the battery charged.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Colson

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nikon camera. The price was great and the quality is outstanding. I have had other Nikon cameras and each one is better then the last and buying from amazon is always the best price and they back their products.
customer_reviews.author: SugarB

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase; especially in lowlight, with movement
customer_reviews.text: Waited an entire year of using this camera before I posted a review. This camera is awful, especially in low light or with any movement (ie. taking pictures of children). Most pics are blurry and despite having a professional play around with the settings, couldn't get the camera to function well. DO NOT BUY! I am going back to Canon.
customer_reviews.author: GFmomoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product because it's easy for me to use. I am by no means a professional photographer, not an electronics guru either. I have a little bit or experience, more like familiarity with this set up because I had a Nikon in the past. It gets the job done and gets the job done well. I am so excited to have a camera that works well to capture those moments again!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Fits in your purse or pocket well and takes good pictures. You'll need to buy a bigger SD card though
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for work. It seems to work for the need. The only real issue is it does not focus so well when using up very close to object. Other than that it's not too bad for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Firechief24

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: She's needed a new digital camera for some time now and she absolutely loves this one. It takes beautiful pictures. The fact that it is red just adds to her love for it. After all, she is an Ohio State fan, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: NOT A VERY STURDY DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: the zoom lens is so fragile it can't taking normal average wear and tear. i had the camera 3 months before the lens began to malfunction
customer_reviews.author: edtv

customer_reviews.title: Almost a pro, in a pocket sized camera
customer_reviews.text: Primarily used as an underwater camera (with an Ikelite case), the camera takes very sharp pictures, and is naturally wide angle. No complaints with operation, durability, focus ability, or lighting.
customer_reviews.author: californiajoe

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: It takes very nice pictures, actually better than I expected. I also love the selective color option and the other possibilities it offers me to enhance what I want to express in every picture I take.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine T.

customer_reviews.title: Good thing in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use has high quality image and important to me, it fits in my shirt pocket. I thought I would have trouble moving the images to my computer, but not a problem just removed the memory card inserted in slot in computer and a prompt came up asking where I wanted to store the images, I sent them to picassa where I could remove "redeye" and do other editing. I would recomend this camera to anyone like me who is not a pro and wants moderatly priced camera that takes high quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: John E Hebbeln

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix s6300 Camera
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera. Only complaint is the battery doesn't last long enough. I like that it is small enough to carry in a clutch bag for weddings and social functions. I would recommend taking charging unit if you are traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie Brush

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix is indeed cool.
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes amazing pictures I used in London, Paris and Las Vegas this year and was really impressed. The software that comes included is also awesome and pretty easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio L. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Basic. Brilliant. Straightforward.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a shirt-pocket camera that would take really competent pictures. This is that! Brilliant screen, excellent features, bright, well-focused images! Very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Nor'west

customer_reviews.title: Cool little camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my Mom. She's been using it and says it's great. The only thing that concerned me was that it felt really flimsy when I first picked it up. Other than that, the camera is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Brand-new camera didn't work. Sent to Nikon repair facility. Returned unrepaired. Camera was never mishandled. Much red tape and paperwork for no satisfactory result. Hope to get a refund. Will not get a replacement. Nikon website to handle repairs was literally non-functional.
customer_reviews.author: Don Rose

customer_reviews.title: Had to send it back, terrible pictures
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this camera because the pictures were always blurry, unless you zoomed in all the way and took an extreme close up of someone's face. I tried every setting possible, and nothing allowed this camera to take a clear picture. I am somewhat confused why this camera has such great ratings, unless I ended up with a faulty camera. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L. McC

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love it! I bought this camera because I got tired of carrying around my Nikon D3000 camera everywhere I went. It takes great picture and videos. I wouldn't trade it for anything. NIKON Products Rules!
customer_reviews.author: Ada Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great to work with these folks.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! Perfect! Fast shipper, well packaged. Now I get to play with my new toy this weekend. Did lots of research online prior to selecting this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift for the GF
customer_reviews.text: She really likes it a lot and that is all that matters. It has great features and can take some pretty nice photos for a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: buddhatheonlyone

customer_reviews.title: Nikon fun.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my camera with one that was compact and versatile, the Coolpix fit the bill. Not a bulky hard to travel with camera small, great resolution and ease of use with 1080p capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I'm having problems with close-ups, hoping it's me and not the camera.. Other than that, it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: COOLPIX S6300
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera primarily for zooming in on wildlife for reference photos for my painting. I like how small it is and how good a picture it takes. I don't like that I have to press the ON button twice for it to turn on. All in all, it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JudyC

customer_reviews.title: good size
customer_reviews.text: good size for carrying on bike or in your pocket. Takes good pictures for distance, haven't figured out how to take good close pictures yet. very satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need great pictures. Excited about camera
customer_reviews.text: Still learning to use camera prior to a long trip. Need great pictures. Excited about camera.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Red Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I think some of the folks reviewing this camera must not know how to use it. You do have to make sure the video focus is set to auto full time in order to make sure the video refocuses as you or your subject moves about. However, 16MP, Nikon image quality, and the 10X optical zoom make this the best deal out there right now. I even dropped it and slightly dented the lens pop-out and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Richard in CA

customer_reviews.title: Blue is Purple!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting the Blue one as advertised! Blue is Purple, had it packed up for return, then decided to keep it. guess I'm lucky it didn't fit in the UPS Night Drop box! Great little camera, just wish it was BLUE!
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoma Buckeye

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX S6300 16 MP Digital Camera with 10x Zoom NIKKOR Glass Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER






Soccer games, first days of school, weekend trips to the beach...don't forget the camera! Compact enough to tuck in a pocket or purse and fast enough to be ready in an instant, the COOLPIX S6300 will capture the wide variety of activities your family enjoys. Its powerful 10x optical zoom-NIKKOR glass lens and high-resolution 16.0-megapixel CMOS sensor delivers exceptional photos and Full HD (1080p) movies with stereo sound in any setting. Catch moments around a dimly lit birthday cake or sun soaked days at the lake in brilliant Nikon quality.




PORTABLE VERSATILITY
COMPACT, POWERFUL 10X OPTICAL ZOOM
Imagine the photos and movies you can capture with a compact camera that features a powerful 10x optical zoom lens. Vary your shots: zoom out to capture the fun and laughter at a party, zoom in to frame a winning goal. Your photos and HD movies will be sharp and clear thanks to the S6300's versatile 10x optical Zoom-NIKKOR glass lens (25–250mm) with built-in optical VR Image Stabilization technology.





CAPTURE ALL THE FAMILY ACTION
HIGH-RESOLUTION 16.0 MP CMOS SENSOR
With the S6300's 16.0 MP CMOS sensor, awesome images can be shot under challenging low-light conditions. Capture spontaneous fast action with this highly responsive camera. Nikon's CMOS sensor technology directs a maximum amount of light to each pixel to render high image quality even when the light is dim.





BRING IT HOME IN MOTION
FULL HD (1080P) MOVIES WITH STEREO SOUND
Touch a button and start your movie recording with continuous autofocus and stereo sound! Memorable moments are saved in Full HD (1080p). Get creative and have fun recording slow- and fast-motion movies, too. When you're ready, play back your movies and photos on an HDTV (via the camera's HDMI port) or a computer. Best yet, upload to the Web to share your memories with everyone.





WIDE-VIEW PANORAMAS
GET 180º AND 360º VIEWS OF YOUR WORLD
Easy Panorama Mode combines multiple shots into a seamless 180º or 360º panoramic image. Begin by focusing on your starting point. Once the camera detects your directional pan, the shooting starts and images begin stitching together in-camera. Use the handy in-monitor guidelines to keep the view aligned and track your progress. Amazing!








MAKE IT FUN FOR ALL
A HOST OF IN-CAMERA SPECIAL EFFECTS
Apply in-camera Special Effects such as Low Key, High Key, Nostalgic Sepia, even Selective Color to add a creative touch to images and movies. Or, add a creative Filter Effect like Fisheye or Miniature to your still shots in playback.








GREAT PHOTOS HAVE NEVER BEEN EASIER
The S6300 is so easy to use—just turn on the camera and shoot! Super simple camera operation starts with minimal buttons and modes.











Whats In The Box: The list of items is included with the Camera

 * AN-CP19 Strap 
 * UC-E6 USB Cable 
 * EG-CP16 Audio Video Cable 
 * EN-EL12 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery 
 * EH-69P AC Adapter/Charger 
 * NikonView NX 2 CD-ROM 





FLATTERING PORTRAITS EVERY TIME
You'll love Nikon's Smart Portrait System with Smile Timer, a mode that automatically recognizes when a subject is smiling and releases the shutter.
feature_bullets: Full HD (1080p) Movies with Stereo Sound

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars484 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
